Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great deal on a quality printer!
Item.Review: It is sleek in design and prints faster than most personal printers. It is easy to use and prints perfectly. It is the perfect size for my computer armoir due to its compact size. This is really a nice home computer!
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy setup. Good quality. Modes will not reset
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality and Price
Cons: When Copy is used, printer sticks in copy mode. Takes hours to reset.
Great printer for the price. Set up was fairly easy. The quality of print and photos is great. When we use the copy mode, the printer will not reset automatically. We have to toggle the print, fax and scan buttons many many times to get it to reset. Have not found a fix.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best printer I've had by far
Item.Review:
Pros: Low ink, quiet, fast, affordable, lots of features
Cons: You have to manually turn the paper to print on both sides.
I've owned HP, Lexmark, and Epson printers. This one surpasses them all. Positives: If you put it on the quiet setting, it's very quiet. It prints very fast on the standard setting, uses little ink, and deep cleans when needed. It's not a monster in size either. Easy to set up with my network and wireless system. Uses military time.
Drawbacks, but not deal breakers: It would be nice if the screen was backlit. Instead of the printer automatically feeding the paper to print both sides, you have to manually turn it over. Fingerprints tend to show on it (if you're OCD like me)

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Reliable; Easy To Use
Cons: Hard Setup
Setting up the printer for wireless and fax was s somewhat confusing. However, once we set it up, it was great. We never had a wireless printer before and we were able to set up other computers in the house to print to it without any issues.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Quiet; Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Great Print Quality
I send a lot of greeting cards. The Canon does custom envelopes. After 9 hours ,at 4 different times with a tech trying to get an HP to work, I traded it in for this Canon. The HHGregg manager was wonderful. He said,"Considering what you've been through, it's the least I could do." The Canon is seamless, easy to set up, does e-print without me signing my life away on thee internet. I put the CD in and clickety click and it was done. Didn't have to put the IP number again and again as I did with the HP.The HP techs didn't know that it didn't do custom envelopes. HP said it was the fault of my Toshiba laptop. I called Toshiba and they told me that that the printer did not do custom ... envelopes. No Christmas cards on that one. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great, but replacement ink too expensive
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Reliable
Setup to print from my iPad didn't have adequate instruction. Replacement ink cartridges are way expensive! I love the wireless printing and scanning.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, WIFI connection, Multi page feeder
Cons: nothing yet
Needed a new printer, salesman knew my son and recommended this as the best bang for the buck and he was right. WIFI setup was relatively easy and works! Really love that WIFI and no cable. I do not think it is the highest quality or good for photo's but for the price I recommend it.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great one-touch scanning,wireless setup a struggle
Item.Review:
Pros: Very user friendly one-touch interface for scanning...
Cons: Configuration setup help for wireless printing leaves a lot to be desired...
I recently purchased the Canon - PIXMA MX432 Wireless All-In-One printer (print, scan, copy and fax) and have been very happy with it the printer scanning functionality. The one-touch pop-up interface within Windows XP is very user-friendly and was easy to explain to my wife and daughter. The one warning that I would pass along is to NOT plug in this printer to a Windows XP box without first installing the software. I did the software install on a laptop first and then plugged in the printer and it worked fine. On another desktop computer I was attempting to get the wireless printing configuration setup working and thought that I had ... to have the USB cable plugged in. Unfortunately once the computer sees the hardware if the software is not setup then it is very difficult to fix. I scoured the web for advice and finally got the desktop computer to see the printer. I still have NOT been successful at getting the wireless printing function to work. Overall very happy with this purchase but NOT too happy with the user friendliness of the wireless setup configuration. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Durable construction
Cons: Hard Setup
About installation after 2 days we found the button the instructions said to push. Turns out it wasn't even on the printer; it was on the router. Otherwise ok. my cd rom is broke so I went to cannon for easy downloadable drivers. My android sends to it, via my app. The ipad automatically is set up once the wi-fi is complete with the printer. Just find your pic and proceed to options, print.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: REALLY easy to set up
Cons: Screen not backlit
This is my first wireless printer. I own a Canon DSLR so I wanted to give this printer a try.
I must say that this is the easiest printer I've tried setting up for all the computers at home. It also prints from my iPad without any problem which is very cool.
One thing I can bring a complaint about this printer is its screen. The screen is not backlit so at night, I need to turn all my light up in my living room or bring my flashlight/cell phone to print. It's not a huge deal for a printer I bought for $50. I can live with it.
Otherwise, I don't have any compaints. Great product for great price.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: Range of Wifi and misprinting pages
Since Day 1 the WIFI has been an issue. It is only 60 feet away but separated by a few walls. I expect that the signal should not be an issue at this range. As a result I have to plug directly using a USB connection. I have printed about 50 documents varying from 1 page to as many as 10. On 2 ocassions, the printer did not print one of the pages. Luckily I double counted but this is a serious issue. The black ink ran out quite quick too but maybe bc I was printing some photos.
I paid $69 so what do you expect for that price.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Air print feature
Cons: a little big
I have had this printer for about a month now. I immediately set it up wirelessly at my house and on my smartphone. The airprint feature is nice to have so I can print pictures right from my phone. The quality is good (not professional) but easier than going to the store for a few smaller pictures. It was a great printer for the price (bought on sale) and haven't had any issues. It is a little on the bulky side but we use in a home office in a built-in so not an issue to us really.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient
Set up was quick and the directions were easy to follow. My only problem was using the fax feature. I called customer support and they were able to talk me through the directions for the fax. The screen on the printer is very small and somewhat difficult to read. The functions of the printer are very good and I am happy with my purchase.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Quality Construction
I've been using bargin basement inkjets for years. When I replaced my computer with Windows 7 and also added WIFI, it came time to add a new printer. The Pixma 432 met my criteria of multi-function, WIFI, and good price on sale. I've come to rely on Canon inkjets because they don't have built-in print heads. The heads are part of the ink cartridges. Because I don't print daily, if the ink drys or plugs, all I have to replace is the ink cartridge.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: We really like the printer, as it warms up fast, and prints fast. The print quality is great. The wireless setup went smoothly. We have no issues with this printer and it works as advertised. This printer was to replace an older Samsung. Definately a good deal and 5 STARS!!!!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This product was so easy to install and easy to operate. The price was lower than the one in the stores and I can't believe that I finally have a printer and fax the work!!!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Does everything I need and inexpensive to operate.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up and the price was right.
Cons: Having difficulty getting FAX to answer when I am not home.
This printer does eveything I need it to. I very rarely FAX so it doesn't bother me that I can't get a FAX when I am not home. It is very easy to do letters and envelopes. I like the way it feeds the paper as well.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Efficient
Cons: LCD hard to read; Tray too short
Compact design, so it fits any space. Receiving tray too short for paper. Have to stand by it so printed paper doesn't fall to the floor.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient
Cons: Can't receive fax with; Difficult To Set Up
called tech support. I was not able to receive fax with ans. machine ON. I was told in order to receive FAX. the ans. machine has to be OFF. no problem sending fax. Otherwise it works fine.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Inefficient; Difficult To Set Up; Hard To Use
Lets start with set up....hard! I admit I'm no tech person however I just got a new computer and got it fully set up on my own in 1 hour. It is NOT plug and play! When running the CD after installation got an error not compatabile with IE 9. Ran problem solver got a message to go to Cannon's web site and find plug in but no link. So I had to go hunting to find plug in. Then when printing it prints in backwards order....have to tell it to print the right way. Short paper tray and if printing >2 pages throws them in the floor. Still haven't gotten wireless to work. I'll stop there but could go on....will never buy Cannon again!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Does everything I want it to
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up and prints fast
I bought this printer to use at home for work and personal use. So far, it works great and it prints much faster than the Epson printer I had before. It took me a while to figure out the scanner but that probably wouldn't have been the case if I would have read the directions. I have not used it to fax anything yet. I have printed a few things in color which looked fine and haven't printed any pictures yet but that's not what I bought it for. I haven't been using it long enough to report about the ink consumption. This is an excellent printer for my home office.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is the worst printer I've ever owned. It will not feed without jamming. Could be the design of the paper tray which is flimsy. I went to Office Depot to replace an HP Photosmart that would not print black and white so now I guess I dump this and get an HP Thinkjet.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Printing is good
Cons: Sometimes the paper jams up in my case more then 10 times.
I don't like the WiFi setup on this I cannot find to set my password permanently on it. If the power is unplugged and plugged back in it loses the WiFi then I got to push the WiFi button to reconnect it. But I know what I am doing if someone was not able to connect again they probably wouldn't think of pushing the WiFi button again right off the bat. The only bad part is the WiFi and printer jams. Other then that no problems. It is still a good buy I am not returning it unless something really goes wrong.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to setup and works flawlessly
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to setup and the wireless works very well
I have had a number of all in one printers over the last few years and they were always quirky and hard to setup. And, if the setups ever got messed up it was nearly impossible to get things going again without calling tech support. This printer, however, just worked as soon as I turned it on. I followed the few easy steps and got it on my wireless network very quidkly. It works from my main computer, my laptop and I downloaded the Android app for printing pictures. It's terrific.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price was right for our purposes.
Cons: A littlle bit bigger then needed.
This was bought for my granddaughter to use at college. We didn't need anything elaborate so this worked out fine. I haven't heard any complaints from her so everything must be okay.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is such a great printer and I purchased it for a great price through B&H Photo. It was at least [$]-[$] more at all the other retailers. This product arrived quicker than I thought since I got free shipping. This product makes excellent quality copies and prints quickly for an ink jet printer. Will be purchasing more products from B&H Photo in the future.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: big, slow, burns through ink quickly
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing really
Cons: drains ink cartridges quickly
this is barely an ok printer. it is a pretty big printer with a large footprint area. it is pretty slow in printing/scanning/copying and burns through the ink cartridges very quickly. I have had to call the support line for numerous faxing issues & the electronic operations/user guide is pretty vague and often not very useful/helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Airplay so we can print from our iPads
Cons: None
Airplay function is all we are looking for and this printer is available with a great price. We have several other printers (wireless or not). But none of those are airplay enable.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: it works!
Cons: paper tray is not long enough
over all this is a nice and easy to use all in one printer and scanner. It does have fax capabilities but I don't use that function. Only two inks, color and black. Nice printer for the money. Thumbs up!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: MX432 adequate for most home offices
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless; Relatively quiet; Good print quality; Multi-function
Cons: No rear paper tray; Large footprint; Canon ink is not cheap
Wireless setup is a bonus, although very difficult to set up given the very small (one line) LCD display. This unit is very large and takes up quite a bit of desktop real estate. There on only a front paper tray which sticks out a bit. Printing is fine for every day use, but would be a plus if it offered photo in in multi cartridges. Compared to the competition, this printer does what it is designed to do at a fair price.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Quality Construction
I have been an HP guy my whole life. I was very weary about trying a canon... I am sooo happy that I did!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction; Reliable; Great value for ink use
My family has had Cannon cameras for decades and I have had a Cannon printer for 6 years. All have been solid buys with great performance.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: price was good, does the job.
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Quality Construction
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
it's a nice product. I had faster printers. it does the job. copy and printing could be a little faster. otherwise it is good.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great wireless printer for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: A lot of features and its wireless
Cons: slower printing than what I was used to
Once it was set up, this is a wonderful wireless printer for the price. The quality of the printing and copying is not bad for home use. For heavy duty business use it may not survive.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy to Use
Cons: Inefficient
I miss the feature my previous printer had, where there were separate cartridges for each color ink - there's just a single color cartridge with this printer. I also found some of the set-up difficult. It would have been nice if there were actual written directions for the step-by-step portion. I ended up skipping a part of the setup and following the onscreen prompts from the disc.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction; Easy to Use; Reliable
It was easy to set up. Its work great. I was so happy to print downstairs while I was upstairs in bed. Awesome

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Efficient; Easy to Use
Realizing this was not the latest of the line, it is perfect for me -- i need all the 4 functions, but have "older" software and it works perfectly well. no problems with setup and/or function. i recommend it if you are not into the absolute latest of anything, but appreciate a good product.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great performance at a great price
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction; Efficient; Easy to Use
printer works flawlessly. Love the wireless capabilities and even prints out decent pictures.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Very Nice Printer For iPad Users
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
I've only had this printer for a short time. But, already it has become an important addition to my IT resources.
Before I purchased this printer, I experienced frequent frustration attempting to print from my iPad. I tried several different apps to get the results I wanted. Unfortunately, none were satisfactory when used with my existing printers.
They were hard to use, didn't provided the desired result of did not included the function I needed.
This printer fills the bill. It prints directly from all the apps I need to have hard copy and does it quickly & quietly.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Efficient; Quality Construction; Reliable
Brought this is an emergency. My other printer died. It prints good copies. Some of the extra features a little complicated, but otherwise, does everything you would typically need.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Compact and Easy to Set Up
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
I haven't used this product long enough to know how reliable it will be. I bought it primarily to be a copier and that it does well enough. The color copy isn't quite as sharp as the original but I would be using is mostly for black and white text copies

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to use
Cons: nothing yet
I use it mostly to print documents and it's been easy to use. Prints clean. Since I print mostly in Black what i like is that the ink cartridges are separate.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Cons: Hard To Use; Inefficient
Supposed to "duplex" print. Will only "duplex" one page at a time. Duplex feature is a waste of time and money.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Quality Construction; Reliable
The Pixma MX 432 IS A great multi purpose printer. We find it easy to set up and use.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: It was inexpensive, it's wireless, easy to set up
Cons: Makes a lot of noise after printing is complete
For the money you can not beat this printer. It's quick, good quality, multifunction, wireless system that was perfect for my home office.
mainly use it to print online documents, email, and faxing. Have not tried the scanning yet.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A superb printer for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use and reliable
Cons: It's a little slow but who is in a hurry?
Canon has come up with a simple, easy to use, no frills printer that prints very well. Changing print cartridges is easier on the Canon than on any other brand I have used. From now on I will be buying Canon printers. This MX432 is a honey and it won't break the bank.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
I had a little trouble seeting up this printer but, I'm not the most tech savy person. The printer has been great though. Other poeple may have less trouble setting it up to there wi-fi system.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Great machine. Setup was fairly simple except for Airprint. The all-in-one required a firmware update to enable AirPrint capability and that took some research. The actual process was pretty painless. It now works perfectly.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Quality Construction
I LIKE this printer alot. It was easy to set up, and a joy to operate. I would recomend this printer for all home and busines use.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless, ability to use AirPrint
Cons: Some of the plastic parts seem very delicate
Great second printer for the money. Needed a printer to print from iPad. This does the trick.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A quality printer for a great price
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality copies; Very simple to set up; Efficient; Reliable; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Printer Wfaxscancopy
Cons: Slow Copy Print Time
So far I am very satisfied as of this date using my Canon Wireless printer, fax, scanner, and copy machine. The ink cartridges do not seem to last long enough and the final product is slow to print. Other than these two concerns I think this printer will be very usefull in my needs to print or use the other features with great success.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Paper jam, paper jam, paper jam....
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing bc it doesn't print
Cons: It looks pretty.
No wonder it was only $70. Every other page I try to print gets "paper jammed". Now there's a piece that's broken off somewhere inside the printer. Not only can I not get to it, I have now idea to continue printing.
Do not buy this unless you want to pull an Office Space and go ballistic on it later.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: The ability to change from one function to another
Cons: SLOW on the print if you go grey scale
I used it alot since we got it to print emails and alot of other things the fax is easy to use and seems to work well so far.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Easy to Use; Reliable; Air Print Capable; Easy To Set Up; Ios Android Devices; Efficient
Price was reasonable for a Printer that Prints Laser Quality.
Prints very fast!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: i use the printer and the scanner and like them both......its definitely the printer that you can do anything on...the set up was extremely easy for the cartridges and getting the wi fi set up..good price for this kind of printer

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use right out of the box
Cons: no backlit menu board
This printer is good for home computing and the ink is about $20 per cartridge, which is always the case with a printer, but its fast and very clear copies, I like it better than my Ol HP !!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Efficient; Easy to Use
I've always had HP printers, decided after talking with the representative from the store (very knowledgeable), I bought this Canon. So far, I've only had it for a week, but it's working fine and does everything! It's a little noisier than the one I had before, but it's ok, noise is not an issue in my house.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: You can print from your iPhone and the quality is good.
Cons: Haven't found anything I don't like yet.
I am a teacher and part-time photographer. I use it mostly for school work, and it has given me satisfaction so far.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy set up
Cons: Paper jams, small screen, small paper tray
Overall, this product isn't terrible but if you're looking to print a lot at one time I wouldn't recommend it. The paper tray is quite small and easily gets jammed. Also, if you're looking to print double-sided automatically, you will not get that feature on this model. I returned and upgraded to a HP Photosmart 6510.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: easy set up and it's wireless!
Cons: haven't found anything not so great yet.
I'm really pleased with this all in one printer. Before I had everything separate and it was a pain! Now, it's all at my fingertips and wireless, too! The print quality is excellent and faxing is a breeze. I would highly recommend this!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Value all in one printer
Item.Review: I have been using Canon Pixma series for sometime. This is now my 3rd printer. I have found the print quality good and the printer reliable.The reason I bought this was the need to scan multiple documents at the same time. In the past scanning documents was a pain and now since I was going to scan many more documents I decided to get this.So far (used for a week), the product works as advertised.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up
I was told years ago that Canon made the 'engines' for HP, so I thought the low price didn't mean low quality. I was right :-)

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Printer for a decent price
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to setup, great price, wireless, print from iPhone 4s(must download app first)
Cons: the screen isn't backlit
This printer is a great printer for the price I paid for it(got it on sale). I installed the software and within a few minutes I was printing. I was able to hook up my other two computers in no time. Was reading more about this and found out I could print from my iPhone 4s and downloaded the app(Canon iEPP) and was able to print in no time. Prints a little slow but no worries I don't need it to print extremely fast for my occasional use.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything works as described.
Cons: More noise than expected.
I have only had the printer for a little over a month, but am impressed with the overall functionality of the unit. Does everything the specifications says it will do.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless All-in-one w/ fax
Cons: Print cartradges are a little expensive
This printer works great for what I need it for and it was very easy to setup and get started. It is a little bulky for personal use, but I haven't experienced any issues with it so far. It's really great for home office use.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Operation
This machine is so fast it actually creates a nice, cool breeze as it operates. Ha! But seriously, we had no idea that our old one was such a dinosaur until we made the switch.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Printer works great with my iPhone!!
Item.Review: works great with airprint!!! this was the main reason I purchased... no need to install anything... just connect to wifi and its going!! also, the ink is great too!! the color cartridge is all in one! separate color cartridges are too messy and expensive... love the top loader! great printer...

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: We've only owned the printer for three weeks, but so far so good. We haven't had any issues. My tech-savy husband did all the wireless set up, he didn't seem to have a problem. Prints pretty fast and clear. Haven't needed to buy ink yet and I've been printing quite a bit.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Having problem with faxing materials
I bought this printer to replace an older one. I have trouble with receiving and sending faxes. Other than that I love Canon products.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
there are no instructions for using the photo copier , etc,etc, unless you have the time to get on line and go to the website and study it. There is no way of knowing just what this machine will do, without research. Very poor. No instructions for the scanner. The sales person obviously does not know what is included with the machine, they insist that you need a USB cord, which is included . If you are a customer not close to a retail store, it is very inconvenient. I need to travel 60 miles one way to return the things that I did not need, but was charged for. Sales need more information.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Does everything we needed it to do.
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast speed and easy hook-up
Cons: A little loud.
Just bought this printer 4 days ago. Hooked up 3 computers (wi-fi). So far works great, however, a little loud. Would recommend it highly to anyone.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Copy receiver TOO SHORT, drops papers
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Reliable; Quality Construction
Cons: Drops copy on floor; Inefficient
If there is more than one copy, it dumps them on the floor! Copy catcher should be extended 1".

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Hard To Use; Difficult To Set Up
In order to receive a fax (when sharing a phone line) you have to go into the fax menu and click so many times just to switch back and forth. too annoying and complicated.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent scan software and quality scanner; B+ print quality-good enough.
Cons: Ink cartridge too small; ink not listed on BB's website.
Got my monies worth. Be sure and order a back-up ink cartridge; goes fast if your are busy.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction; Easy to Use
This printer was a dream setting up, I hate adding software to my pc, it always takes a long time to load, but this priter did it in such a short time. I love it.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless, easy to set up, prints fast from any computer on my network
Cons: haven't found anything yet
I bought this printer because I wanted an inexpensive wireless printer, and I was upgrading from my old Cannon MP 210. I've had it for a month now and I don't really have any complaints, It does everything I need it to. My old Cannon lasted 4 years and I would still be using it if the scanner top hadn't of broken off from moving, I expect this new printer will last a good long time. :) I haven't used it for faxing because I don't have a landline to hook it up to, I really wish it could connect to google voice or something so I could fax from home. Other than that it's a nice little printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I received this item about 3 days ago and found it delightful to set up for use with my iPad 3. It did not require use of a PC to start using it for an AirPrinter. To this point I have enjoyed immensly using it to print texts and photos, easily and conveniently. Now I hope to scan documents and photos into the iPad, but have not yet done so. More later. BTW: it also prints nicely from my PC, which I hope to soon no longer need. Give me a good word processor and a good spreadsheet and PCs can go away! Note too, that I am delighted with B&H Photo: what they promised happened just as they said it would.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing, it looked pretty
Cons: I couldnt get it to work
I was excited when I first purchased it, there was a Canon associate in the store and he was very helpful. When I got the product home, I was not able to get it to work. I called the customer support and was on the phone with a very pleasant lady for an hour trying to get it to work take it back to the store, or I could wait for a refurbished one to come and replace my brand new one. NOT. I just took it back and [purchased a different brand.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: The multi functions
Cons: none
I just got it today. I upgraded from the Pixma MP240 that had been lightly used. I recently got a laptop and my original printer did not have WIFI and I was looking for a multi function printer that would include the WIFI that i was in need of. I decided to stick with canon because of its reputable name.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This really is an All-In-One product. All the features work as they should, and my old computer is still running Windows XP. The unit is a little larger than I expected, but considering all that it does you can't go wrong. I haven't used it enough to comment on ink usage.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: GOOD "ALL IN ONE" FOR THE BUCK
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design
Cons: Hard Setup; Slow Print Time
IT'S COMPACT. I'VE NOT HAD IT VERY LONG, BUT IT'S GOOD FOR THE PRICE.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: im so glad i got it
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Looks Greatexspensive; Compact Design; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Use
I print color doc. off line and recipes

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX432 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy wireless setup
Cons: Nothing yet!
Easy to install, prints quickly, and amazes me how easy wireless setup was!

Item.Review: Home use,photo,and fax for work, print speed is good,nice size for home use too.
